sense.gloss: speciality, specialty, subject of study, expert, area of expertise
(one's) exclusive use, private use, personal use
dedicated use, use for a particular purpose
exclusive use (of particular products), using only (e.g. a certain brand), using solely
special occupation, principal occupation, specialty, monopoly
absorption, giving undivided attention, devoting oneself (to)
special duty, being in sole charge of a duty
wholly, solely, entirely, exclusively, devotedly, fixedly
something that is specialized for a certain field or application (e.g. a sauce specially made for zaru soba)
having a fetish for ..., specializing in ..., majoring in ...
doing as one pleases, acting selfishly
single-mindedly, wholeheartedly, with one's heart and soul

r_ele.r: しないりょうほうせんもんい
じびいんこうせんもんい

sense.gloss: arbitrary decision, using one's own discretion, acting on one's own authority
book in specialized field, book in specialised field
